results.description: AC Milan will launch an anti-racism task force at this weekend's derby against Inter in response to a number of racist incidents in recent weeks.
results.shortTitle: AC Milan to launch anti-racism initiative
results.title: AC Milan to launch anti-racism initiative before Inter derby

thumbnail.altText: Romelu Lukaku playing for Inter Milan

results.description: Italian club Cagliari will face no punishment after being cleared of racist chanting towards Inter Milan striker Romelu Lukaku.
results.shortTitle: Cagliari not guilty of Lukaku racism
results.title: Cagliari cleared of racist chanting towards Inter Milan striker Romelu Lukaku

results.description: Italian football authorities and their disciplinary systems to combat racism are "not fit for purpose", says the chief of anti-discriminatory body Fare.
results.shortTitle: 'Racism rot is deep in Italian football'
results.title: 'Racism rot is deep' in Italian football, says anti-discriminatory body Fare

results.description: A group of Inter Milan fans claim Cagliari supporters were showing Romelu Lukaku a form of "respect" when they aimed monkey chants at him on Sunday.
results.title: Romelu Lukaku: Monkey chants a form of 'respect' and 'not racist' say Inter Milan fans group

results.description: Romelu Lukaku says "we are going backwards" on racism after he was racially abused by Cagliari fans while playing for Inter Milan.
results.shortTitle: We're going backwards on racism - Lukaku
results.title: Romelu Lukaku: Ex-Man Utd striker says 'we are going backwards' on racist abuse

results.description: Inter Milan striker Romelu Lukaku is racially abused by Cagliari fans as he scores from the spot to give his club a 2-1 victory in Serie A.
results.title: Romelu Lukaku: Inter Milan striker racially abused in Cagliari game

thumbnail.altText: Inter Milan's Romelu Lukaku at Cagliari

results.description: Inter Milan midfielder Radja Nainggolan joins Serie A rivals Cagliari on loan until the end of the season.
results.title: Radja Nainggolan: Inter Milan midfielder joins former club Cagliari on loan

results.description: Serie A decides not to sanction Cagliari for their fans' racist abuse of Juventus forward Moise Kean.
results.title: Moise Kean: Serie A opts not to sanction Cagliari for racist abuse

results.description: Leonardo Bonucci's reaction to racist chants aimed at Moise Kean was poorly judged, says Juventus manager Massimiliano Allegri.
results.title: Juventus' Leonardo Bonucci mistaken in Moise Kean comments - Massimiliano Allegri

thumbnail.altText: Juventus forward Moise Kean is consoled by team-mate Joao Cancelo after being racially abused during a Serie A match in Cagliari

results.description: The suggestion that Juventus forward Moise Kean was partly to blame for racist abuse is laughable, says Manchester City's Raheem Sterling.
results.title: Moise Kean: Raheem Sterling says Leonardo Bonucci racism comments laughable

results.description: Juventus' Italian teenage forward Moise Kean suffers racist abuse from the stands during Tuesday's match at Cagliari.
results.title: Moise Kean: Juventus teenage striker suffers racist abuse at Cagliari

results.description: Spanish champions Barcelona visit struggling Villarreal, while Italian leaders Juventus travel to Cagliari - follow live text commentary.
results.title: Barcelona rescue draw in Villarreal thriller

results.description: Juventus restore their six-point lead at the top of Serie A with a hard-earned victory over Cagliari
results.shortTitle: Juventus win restores six point lead
results.title: Juventus 3-1 Cagliari: Juve restore six point lead

thumbnail.altText: Paulo Dybala celebrates scoring for Juventus

results.description: Barcelona travel to Rayo Vallecano in La Liga and Juventus host Cagliari in Serie A - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Late drama as Barcelona beat Rayo
results.title: European live: Rayo Vallecano v Barcelona plus Juventus v Cagliari updates

results.description: Andrea Pirlo thinks he's among Italy's best - what does the future hold for Cagliari midfielder Nicolo Barella?
results.title: Nicolo Barella: The Cagliari midfielder lauded by Andrea Pirlo

results.description: Liverpool defender Ragnar Klavan joins Serie A side Cagliari for 2m on a two-year contract.
results.title: Ragnar Klavan: Liverpool defender joins Cagliari for 2m

results.description: Inter Milan hammer Cagliari to move above Roma into third in Serie A as they bid to ensure Champions League football next season.
results.title: Inter Milan 4-0 Cagliari

results.description: Mauro Icardi scores twice as Inter Milan move above Napoli and top of Serie A with victory over Cagliari.
results.title: Cagliari 1-3 Inter Milan

results.description: Napoli become the first team in Serie A history to win their opening seven games while scoring 25 goals, after beating Cagliari.
results.title: Napoli 3-0 Cagliari

results.description: Adel Taarabt is one of two Genoa players sent off in injury time after Inter Milan score a late winner.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-0 Genoa
